title: 31st Golden Melody Awards
text:
The 31st <a href="Golden%20Melody%20Awards">Golden Melody Awards</a> () take place in Taipei, Taiwan in 2020. The ceremony was scheduled for 27 June 2020, but rescheduled to 3 October, due to the <a href="COVID-19%20pandemic%20in%20Taiwan">COVID-19 pandemic</a>, and moved to the <a href="Taipei%20Music%20Center">Taipei Music Center</a>.
Winners and nominees.
Below is the list of winners and nominees for the popular music categories.
